citation: Proclamation under the Weed Management Amendment Act 2007 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Weed Management Amendment Act 2007

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Weed Management Amendment Act 2007 fix 1 January 2008 as the day on which that Act commences.

20 December 2007

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2007

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries and Water.
